subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Iman Shumpert, who has started every game of the playoffs, skipped the Knicks’ morning shootaround Tuesday and was 0-for-6 in the Game 4 loss.
snippet: Iman Shumpert, who has started every game of the playoffs, skipped the Knicks’ morning shootaround Tuesday and was 0-for-6 in the Game 4 loss.
